column4: Ubuntu install wouldn't work, I found debian, how similar are all of the different versions of nix systems you can download??
IF I install a different version of a nix system will it make ubuntu load easier?
what seems to bbe the problem'?
there is a check cd for defects on the boot menu
I ran that with no errors
i386, amdx64 or power pc, that is what i mean
I"m not sure, I believe i386
in the download area, there is an X86 alternate version
I went and bought a new wireless card for my laptop because I was told it would work with ubuntu
